title: Pierluigi Bersani biography. Italian politician
snippet: He studied philosophy at the University of Bologna, where his thesis focused on the history of Christianity. Political Career Bersani&039;s political career began in the ranks of the left-wing Democratic Party.

title: Pier Luigi Bersani facts for kids
snippet: Bersani began his political journey by joining the Italian Communist Party. Later, he became a member of the Democratic Party of the Left. In this party, he was in charge of economic matters.
